title: (Fri Full) Bobby Shares a MAJOR Announcement + Ryan Hurd Performs Duet with Amy + Brings in Maren Morris and Hardy To Perform New Single
itunes:title: (Fri Full) Bobby Shares a MAJOR Announcement + Ryan Hurd Performs Duet with Amy + Brings in Maren Morris and Hardy To Perform New Single
description:
Bobby shares a major announcement on the show today…and it’s NOT an April Fool’s joke! And, the day has finally come! Amy performs “Chasing After You” with Ryan Hurd. Ryan also brings his wife Maren Morris and friend Hardy in with him to perform his new song “Pass It On”. And Bobby shares his birthday plans this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
